name: Calliandra
description:
Calliandra is an exploration game, with point-and-click elements.

Calliandra pass the most part of her day in her bedroom, but she notices that the house is more silent than the usual, and she take the opportunity to use her powers during the time. What could happen to her is up to you to know.

* 20 minutes of gameplay

* 3 journal pages to collect

* 2 outcomes after the prologue ending.

(Calliandra is in a prototype state, bugs can happen and will be fixed)
